QuestData.Title: Beds, Bandages, and Beyond
QuestData.Description: Welcome to Azure Watch, $c. Please excuse the disorder you see around you. It's easy to take simple things for granted, like a fully furnished and stocked inn, until you're forced to build one from nothing.$B$BWe've managed to salvage this pod for a building, but without the proper furnishings and first aid supplies, the inn is little more than a glorified tent. Nurguni at the Exodar has offered to put together a package to help with our most immediate needs, but I need someone to deliver this list to him.
QuestData.LogDescription: Take Chellan's List to the hippogryph master Zaldaan at Azure Watch.
QuestData.CompletionText: Good day, $N. Are you interested in renting a hippogryph?
QuestData.RewardText: So you need to go to the Exodar?$B$BThat's going to be a bit of a trip, but don't worry, I have a way to get you there very quickly.
